column2: ILLINOIS DRIVER'S LICENSE TEST
Question Text
1. When a driver has their left arm and hand extended downward, the driver plans to:
2. This sign warns drivers of:
column6: a low place in the road.

column2: 3. All constructions zones in Illinois are no passing zones.
4. Roads are most slippery:
column8: when it first starts to rain.

column2: 5. When they see this sign, drivers:
column4: should be prepared to make sharp turns at a high speed.
column6: need to be prepared to turn right and then left quickly.
column8: should not speed up or brake quickly.

column2: 6. The first sign drivers see when approaching a highway-rail intersection is usually:
7. What do flashing red lights on a school bus indicate?
column4: The bus is stopped to load or discharge passengers.
column6: Traffic that approaches from either direction may proceed.
column8: The bus is about to stop.

column2: 8. The yield sign means:
column4: Go. The light will soon be red.
column6: If the way is clear, you may move forward slowly without stopping.

column2: 9. ABS is the acronym for:
10. At intersections marked with stop lines, drivers must:
column6: slow down and enter the intersection.

column2: 21. A large vehicle is backing up to unload goods. You should:
column4: enter one of the blind spots and wait.
column8: be patient and wait until the large vehicle has completed its backup maneuver.

column2: 22. More than one vehicle is approaching a four-way stop sign. Who has the right of way?
column6: The last driver to reach the intersection.
column8: The first driver to reach the intersection and stop.

column2: 23. Air bags are meant to _________ seat belts.
24. On what three conditions does your blood alcohol content (BAC) depend?
column4: Your weight. The type of beverage you drink. How fit you are.
column6: Your height. How much alcohol you drink. The type of beverage you drink.
column8: Your weight. How much alcohol you drink. How much time passes between drinks.

column2: 25. This road sign warns drivers that:
column4: the road will make a sharp turn to the right.
column6: left turns are not allowed at the intersection.
column8: another road enters the highway from the direction shown.

column2: 26. When following a motorcycle, drivers must remember that motorcycles can ____________ than other vehicles.
27. When drivers see this road sign:
column4: they must come to a complete stop and call the police.
column6: they must not drive past this sign.

column2: 28. While inside the roundabout, you should:
column4: remain in your lane until you are ready to exit.
column6: change lanes before you check for vehicles behind you.
column8: use your left turn signal if you are in position to exit now.

column2: 29. What should you do if your vision through the windshield becomes blocked?
column6: Open the side window so you can see.

31. What type of pavement marking shows you which lane you must use for a turn?
32. Which signs have black letters on a white background?
33. This sign indicates:
column4: the overpass ahead has a low clearance.
column6: the maximum legal height allowed in this State.
column8: the maximum width of a vehicle allowed on the highway.

column2: 34. This road sign means:
35. This road sign means:
column4: You must bear either right or left
column8: A road joins from the left
